v8:item.v8:content: New in version 1.1.5.11
1. CRM – Leads and campaigns
Leads management with marketing campaigns, sales representatives, and marketing activities. Create campaigns, assign leads, track the progress on the Kanban dashboard. See the CRM menu section.
2. CRM – Sales pipeline report
Sales pipeline report allows you to track the progress of leads within a campaign.
3. CRM – Sales funnel
Sales funnel report shows the conversion rate from a lead to repetitive sales.
4. FIFO – support Landed costs and Customs declaration
Landed costs and Customs declaration are now supported in FIFO.

How to migrate to FIFO cost calculation method: 1. New database – go to the accounting policy, create a new record and set inventory valuation method to FIFO. 2. Existing database, previously used non-FIFO cost calculation method a. Run Company-->FIFO preparation command and follow instructions. b. Go to the accounting policy, create a new record and set inventory valuation method to FIFO. 3. Existing database, previously used FIFO cost calculation method introduced in previous release of 1C:Drive = run Company-->FIFO preparation command and follow instructions.
5. Work order
The work order is now a separate document. Its functionality has been improved and now it is applicable for service companies. The workflow for work order document is the following:
- Input Work order
- Input Inventory transfer to consume materials needed to perform a work
- Input Sales invoice to sell spare parts and services
There are no automatic update procedures, so you will need to manually input all your data in the new document if you previously used work orders.
6. Work order print form
Work order print form added.
7. GL accounts - products
The system of inventory GL accounts and corresponding journal entries has been completely redesigned.

Now, there is "Product GL accounts" information register, which contains rules for filling GL accounts in the tabular sections of all the documents containing product items. You can access it using the link in the Products, Warehouse, Company, and Product categories catalogs. The logic to work with this register is the following: the more restrictions you define, the more deliberately GL accounts will be applied to a transaction. If several rules are applicable to a transaction, the one with more matching restrictions will be applied.
After the update procedure you’ll need to check the default settings for Product GL account register. Obsolete attributes for keeping GL accounts will be removed in the next release.
8. Migrate to 8.3.13 platform version
1C:Drive has been migrated to 8.3.13 platform version which is a minimum system requirement from now on.
9. Early payment discount
Early payment discount is now supported - if a customer makes an early payment, the system will automatically accrue the discount for early payment based on a contract conditions.
You can specify early payment discount (EPD) conditions in a contract and then
- provide EPD to your customers
- and/or obtain EPD from your suppliers via payment documents or debit/credit notes.
10. Goods issue after Sales invoice
Now you can ship goods via Goods issues after invoicing. To do that mark the checkbox “Advance invoice” in the sales invoice.
11. Goods received note (print form)
Goods received note print form in 1C:Drive style added to Supplier invoice, Goods receipt, Inventory transfer, Inventory increase, Credit note, Production, Subcontractor report.
12. Payment calendar
Improved usability of payment calendar report.
Sales and purchase orders now affect payment calendar data only in case of advance payments. Sales invoice and Purchase invoice now determine the real payment calendar data.
13. Matching products catalog with supplier products catalog in the native language
Products matching catalog is used in the following scenarios:
- you need to provide your supplier a purchase order with product names in native supplier language
- you want to match product names in the supplier documents (in the supplier's language) with product names in 1C:Drive
Link for the Products matching catalog added to the Product item form.
You can upload products section of the Supplier invoice and Goods receipt via "Import data from external sources" using Products matching data.
14. Freight amount in Sales Order and Sales invoice

Freight amount in the Order confirmation, Sales invoice, Proforma invoice, Quote print forms now is calculated for the services, marked as "Is freight service". These services are not displayed in the goods sections of mentioned print forms.
15. Foreign currency exchange in an all-in-one document
Now you can input foreign currency exchange transactions with one document. After entering the initial data, it will show you the converted amount and bank fees.
To use it, check that Settings -> Cash management -> Bank charges option is on. There are several types of bank fees calculation, which you can define in the Bank charges catalog.
16. Improve usability of counterparty item form
The item form of the Counterparties catalog reviewed.
17. Sales representatives
Sales reps added. Select a sales rep in a counterparty or a shipping address and it will be inherited to the sales documents.
Use the "Net sales by sales reps" report to view the data.
18. Updated / created help pages for the following functionality
- Goods receipt document
- Customs declaration document
- Sales order document
- Sales invoice document
- Payment terms
- Quotation document
New in version 1.1.4.4
1. FIFO – initial public release
FIFO valuation method is supported in month end-closing and is ready for usage in wholesale and retail companies.
Supported documents:
Credit note
Debit note
Goods issue
Goods return
Inventory increase
Inventory transfer
Inventory write-off
Opening balance entry
Registers correction
Sales invoice
Shift closure
Supplier invoice
Expense report
To start using FIFO run Company-->FIFO preparation command and follow instructions.
After that go to the accounting policy, create a new record and set inventory valuation method to FIFO. You can do it for newly created or existing databases.
Use “Stock statement (FIFO)" report to see your stock value.
Bear in mind, that FIFO method doesn't provide you with instant data about the stock value. Stock value in case of FIFO method is calculated during the month-end closing procedure.
To make FIFO a default method for a newly created database, simply change the accounting policy in the configuration package file (data.xml).
2. Move operation types from Sales invoice and Supplier invoice to Goods issue and Goods receipt
Invoices now used only for the sales/purchases transactions, for other transactions goods issued/receipt documents should be used.
Details:
Consigned goods receipt \ Receipt from contractor \ Receipt for safekeeping operations moved from "Supplier invoice" to "Goods receipt" combining them in one "Receipt from a third party" operation.
Return to consignor \ Return to contractor \ Return from safekeeping operations moved from "Sales invoice" to "Goods issue" combining them in one "Return to a third party" operation.
Transfer to consignee \ Transfer to subcontractor \ Transfer for safekeeping operations moved from "Sales invoice" to "Goods issue" combining in one operation.
Return from consignee \ Return from subcontractor \ Return from safekeeping operations moved from "Supplier invoice" to "Goods receipt" combining in one operation.
Update procedures are not supposed, because former functionality wasn’t used by anyone.
3. Goods Issue / Goods receipt statuses
Goods issues and receipts now have dynamically calculated invoicing statuses
Draft
Not invoiced
Partially invoiced
Invoiced
Not applicable (for those documents, which don’t need to be invoiced)
4. Customs declaration for import

Customs declaration added in order to implement VAT accounting on imported goods. Now you can accrue customs fees, allocate them to inventory, and charge import VAT. Customs declaration can be generated from Supplier invoice or created directly from Purchases menu.
5. Separate VAT input and VAT output accounts
VAT accounting journal entries are now correct from the bookkeeping perspective. VAT payable is calculated in the month-end procedure.
6. Tax invoice print form review
Tax invoice print form reviewed in order to meet the 1C: Drive style.
7. Advance payment invoice (print form)
The advance payment invoice print form added. It is available in the bank receipt, cash receipt, and tax invoice issued documents.
8. Payment terms in purchases

You can set payment terms for each counterparty's contract and change them for any particular purchase document. Payment terms can contain arbitrary payment schedule. Control payment discipline using Account payable and Accounts payable aging reports.
9. Shipping addresses management
Shipping addresses catalog added. It is subordinate to counterparties.
Now you can select a particular shipping address in Sales order, Goods issue and Sales invoice documents.
Shipping address will be displayed in the "Ship to" section of corresponding print forms.
10. Cancel reserves/demand when canceling an order
Sales, purchase, and production orders now can be canceled at any time, leaving the current working progress untouched.
11. Invoices payment status
Both sales and supplier invoices now contain a payment status indicator.
12. Quotation variants
Now it is possible to specify several variants of one Quotation document.
13. RFQ response

RFQ response (also known as Supplier quote, and Supplier proforma invoice) document reviewed to match its real functions. Now it is the symmetrical mechanism to the Quotation document in the Sales subsystem.
14. Bank account in the Bank payment document
Bank payment document now allows selection a payee bank account for all operation types.
15. Financial subsystem reports review

Reports of the Cash management subsystem are carefully reviewed and corrected. Most of the Payroll subsystem reports are also reviewed. The "settlements" term is completely replaced with more suitable terms: billing details, contract currency, etc. The "Structural unit" term is completely replaced with "Business unit" term.
Reports of the Analysis subsystem are also carefully reviewed and corrected.
16. Barcode scanner support
Barcode scanner support added.
Now you can fill-in inventory tabs in most documents by scanning barcodes.
To set up a scanner:
1. Connect scanner to your PC
2. Go to Settings-->Peripherals-->Peripherals
3. Add a new scanner
4. Select hardware driver "1C: Barcode scanners (NativeApi)"
5. For USB scanners press Customize button and select port "Keyboard"
*works only for x32 1c client.
17. AR/AP adjustments and reconciliation statement review
AR/AP adjustments and reconciliation statement reviewed for terms correctness.
18. Added configuration package for UK
19. Added Spanish language
20. Updated / created help pages for the following functionality
RFQ response
Discounts
21. Default interface settings for demo-user
A demo-user has the access to all 1C: Drive features except administrative.
22. Bugfixes
Fixed 49 bugs found during regression tests / reported by partners
New in version 1.1.3.2
1. Goods receipt document
Goods receipt document added. It allows you to register received goods prior to invoicing. It is available in the purchases menu.
2. Payment initiation export
Partners are now able to extend bank statement processors with payment initiation export functionality:
- UI and infrastructure was implemented by 1Ci, partner needs to implement payment initiation file generation only
- sample data processor for generation of MT101 (ISO 15022) protocol message was added, you can use it as a template
- bank expense document now has new "Paid" and "Payment date" attributes to store the actual payment processing information provided by a bank.
3. Multiple print forms improvements
- Sales Invoice print form now displays paid and total due amount
- Purchase order print form redesigned
- Requisition form added to Sales invoice, Goods issue, Inventory transfer, Inventory write-off, Debit note, Subcontractor report issued, Work order
- Removed obsolete print forms from Sales invoice, Supplier invoice, and Inventory transfer
4. New product selection form available in all documents
All documents now use new product selection form. This form was previously available only for Sales Order document, but now it is added to all other documents.
5. Subtotal, Discount, Tax, Total fields added to footer of all documents
Following fields were added to the footer of all relevant documents:
1. Subtotal - the clean amount of items due to a price list
2. Discount - the amount of discount provided
3. Freight - the cost of delivery (reserved for future use)
4. Tax - the amount of VAT or any other tax
5. Total - the final amount to be paid
6. FIFO
FIFO basic framework added. Currently it is not intended for production use, so it is not possible to switch to FIFO completely.
However, you can evaluate the COGS by FIFO using the report "Stock statement (FIFO). To start the FIFO framework do the following after update:
- start the "FIFO preparation" data processor in the Company-->Tools menu
- set up the schedule for "Calculate FIFO" scheduled job.
The following documents are supported:
Credit note
Debit note
Goods Issue
Goods Return
Inventory increase
Inventory transfer
Inventory write-off
Opening balance entry
Registers correction
Sales Invoice
Shift Closure
Supplier Invoice
Expense claim
In the subsequent releases, it will be possible to switch to FIFO and additional documents will be supported.
7. Updated / created help pages for the following functionality
a. Reverse charge VAT
b. Request for quotation
8. Bugfixes
Fixed 56 bugs found during regression tests / reported by partners.
New in version 1.1.2.1
VAT return template
Added VAT return report to gather all the VAT figures in one form. Using this default report:
- a partner can create the VAT return report for a particular country based on the default report (using either additional external reports mechanism or extensions)
- a user can use default VAT return report as a data source for filling-in an actual "VAT return" report specific for his country
Receive multiple Purchase orders with a single Supplier invoice
Added ability to input single Supplier invoice based on multiple Purchase orders.
In order to do it select several Purchase orders and press generate button, or use the selection form in the Supplier Invoice.
Quotation statuses
Quotation document now has the dynamically calculated statuses
- Sent (default status)
- Expired (if Valid until < current date)
- Completed (if there is a Sales invoice or Sales order created on the basis of quote)
The status is calculated by Update document statuses scheduled job, which runs by default every day; from 8:00:00 every 300 seconds.
Remove legacy goods return functionality via invoices
Goods return via Sales and Supplier invoices is removed. Use credit/debit notes instead.

After the update, all your return invoices register entries will be moved to the "Registers correction" documents, journal entries to the "Manual journal entries" documents, and invoices will be marked for deletion.
Issue credit note against sales slip
If you need to reflect a return against a sales slip issued in a previous shift you can now use credit note document.
ImportExportDataXml.epf
ImportExportDataXml data processor is included into distributive. This data processor can be used to transfer data between infobases which were created using English language script variant.
Data processor code and UI is translated into English.
UI / messages review
UI resources / messages have been completely reviewed for the following subsystems
- Sales
- Purchases
- Business calendar review
Updated / created help pages for the following functionality
Goods issue
Quotation
Bugfixes
New in version 1.1.1.5
Goods issue in sales flow (Delivery note)
Goods issue document added. It has delivery note print form and allows you to ship goods prior to invoicing.

Delivery note - a document accompanying a shipment of goods that lists the description and quantity of the goods delivered. A copy of the delivery note, signed by the buyer or consignee, is returned to the seller or consignor as a proof of delivery.
Quote document
You can now generate a quote document.

Quote - a formal statement of promise (submitted usually in response to a request for quotation) by potential supplier to supply the goods or services required by a buyer, at specified prices, and within a specified period. A quotation may also contain terms of sale and payment, and warranties.
Acceptance of quotation by the buyer constitutes an agreement binding on both parties.
Reverse charge VAT
Select the Tax category for a counterparty and it will be inherited to documents. Supplier invoice will make proper entries if the Reverse charge tax category is selected.
Depending on a company's VAT registration, the reverse charge VAT will impact your expenses, or VAT input and output simultaneously.
Also, if you make a Sales invoice with reverse charge, zero-rate will be applied and special text on the print form will be displayed.
Excluded VAT amount from Sales and Purchase registers
The amount in the Sales and Purchase registers is now VAT excluded.
Debit/Credit notes foreign currency exchange support
Debit/credit notes support foreign currency exchange entries if revaluation periodicity is set to "Each transaction" value.
Warehouse menu
Warehouse section is created in the menu. Now you have all your warehouse documents, catalogs, and reports combined in one section.
Sales reports review
Reports of the Sales section are reviewed / corrected. Now they have a comprehensive description, name, and column's headers.
Updated / created help pages for the following functionality
- Bank statement import
- Product selection form
Bugfixes
New in version 1.1.0.1
Bulk metadata renaming
Most metadata objects were renamed in accordance with glossary of business terms. Both object names & synonyms were changed.
VAT in retail sales documents
Retail report (Shift closure) document supports "VAT output" register. You can issue Tax invoice on the basis of Cash receipt document.
New print forms for sales documents
New print forms with unified design and improved look & feel.
Two-phase warehouse support is removed
This functionality considered obsolete. It will be replaced with Goods issue (Delivery note) / Goods receipt functionality in the next releases.
New interface languages (in multi-language release)
Multi-language release of 1C:Drive now contains fully translated interfaces and text messages for the following languages:
- English (source language)
- German
- Polish
- Romanian
- Russian
- Turkish
- Vietnamese
Bugfixes
New Product, version 1.0.0.1
Starting release
• Issue with conterparties in fill forms is fixed. • Issue with ArApAdjustments parameters is fixed. • Other bugfixes.
See also
The application description:
http://1c-dn.com/applications/1c_small_business_free/
Support forum:
http://1c-dn.com/forum/forum9/
